sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import {selectCartItems, selectCartTotalCount} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import './checkout.styles.scss' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' const CheckoutPage = ({cartItems, total}) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{cartItems.map(cartItem =>())}
TOTAL: {total}
*please use the following credit card for payments*
4242 4242 4242 4242 4242 - Exp: 01/20 - cvv: 123
) const mapStatesToProps = createStructuredSelector ({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotalCount }) export default connect(mapStatesToProps)(CheckoutPage)
